title: (x) Looking for font similar to Castellar with lowercase - Goudy Handtooled {Brett Jordan}
content:
I am about to scream! I need a font with lowercase Castellar or a font identical to Castellar that has lowercase, please help! I have attached a screen capture of the fax my wonderful customer sent to me to match :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234913/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_6.pdf) | 225.04 KB |
author: emi henson

comments.content:
Identifont recommends Fashion Engraved - just, ahem, extend it  
 [http://www.identifont.com/list?3+Castellar+7+HE+7+HJU+4+5C7+4+38L+4+2XW+...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234913/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+Castellar+7+HE+7+HJU+4+5C7+4+38L+4+2XW+3+5C8+3+4GB+0+2UD+0+6W0+0+6VX+0+4IO+0+5EN+0+2SB+0+44J+0+4OT+0+ER+0+5RW+0+1N7+0+6R5+0+KI0+0+A9Q+0 "http://www.identifont.com/list?3+Castellar+7+HE+7+HJU+4+5C7+4+38L+4+2XW+3+5C8+3+4GB+0+2UD+0+6W0+0+6VX+0+4IO+0+5EN+0+2SB+0+44J+0+4OT+0+ER+0+5RW+0+1N7+0+6R5+0+KI0+0+A9Q+0")

and I think you might get by with Caslon Open Face  
 [http://www.identifont.com/list?2+caslon+13+3YP+1688+6A5+1215+E8+1199+8LT...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234913/http:/www.identifont.com/list? "http://www.identifont.com/list?")
looks like goudy handtooled to me
Brett is right. Here's Goudy and more [Handtooled fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234913/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Handtooled).
I vote for Goudy Handtooled too.
